mapper.insert:
insert into priority.work_priority_order_catepak_attribute (attr_cd, catepak_cd, company_cd, priority_order_cd, attr_value, flg) values
(#{list.attrCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.catepakCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.attrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.flg,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into priority.priority_order_catepak_attribute(company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd) select company_cd,priority_order_cd,attr_cd,attr_value,flg,catepak_cd from priority.work_priority_order_catepak_attribute where company_cd=#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd}
mapper.select: select sm.id,sm.smalls,sm.rank,sm.branch_num as branchNum,big.bigs from (select pak.id,pak.company_cd,pak.priority_order_cd, string_agg('attr'||(attrs.attr_cd)||':'||coalesce(attrs.attr_value,''),',' order by attrs.attr_cd) as smalls, pak.rank,pak.branch_num from priority.priority_order_catepak pak left join priority.priority_order_catepak_attribute attrs on pak.id = attrs.catepak_cd and attrs.flg = 0 where attr_cd in #{item} group by pak.id,pak.rank,pak.branch_num ) sm left join (select pak.id, string_agg('attr'||(attrm.attr_cd)||':'||coalesce(attrm.attr_value,''),',' order by attrm.attr_cd) as bigs from priority.priority_order_catepak pak left join priority.priority_order_catepak_attribute attrm on pak.id = attrm.catepak_cd and attrm.flg = 1 where attr_cd in #{item} group by pak.id) big on sm.id = big.id where sm.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sm.priority_order_cd =#{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
